Description:
Responsibilities:Carry out analysis and design of building structures using software like Etabs/SAFE, STAAD,SAP, Prokon, PCA, RAM .
Ensure compliance with SNC Quality Management Procedures.
Deliver projects on time and to quality and budget.Skills
Skills: • Bachelor's degree in civil engineering, Structure department
• Excellent graduation at Concrete Project is preferable.
• Experience of 2+ years working in Design office, designing building structures.
• Familiarity with Concrete codes IS/BS, ACI, SBC, ECP, AISC Codes of Practice.
• A flexible attitude to both the type of work undertaken and the level of responsibility given
• You will have a proactive, cooperative and helpful attitude to colleagues and clients
• A self-motivating, reliable and consistent approach to work is essential
• Be able to build excellent working relationships with colleagues and clients.
• Have experience of using written and spoken English within a business environment.
• Practically minded with a problem-solving nature
• Acceptance of responsibility for work carried out
• A flexible and adaptable approach to work is required
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills
